languages.text:
"Желаешь им иной судьбы, Купец?
Сей поворот внезапен, любопытен.
Каким же должен быть их путь, скажи?"

traits.locale_text:
"Мотив неведомый и чуждый здесь —
Аккорды искреннего состраданья!
Позволь задать вопрос, Купец Бездомный".
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
"The Merchant wishes them another fate?
A sudden turnabout, and curious.
What path ought they to take? All ears am I."
languages.original_text:
"Желаешь им иной судьбы, Купец?
Сей поворот внезапен, любопытен.
Каким же должен быть их путь, скажи?"

traits.locale_text:
"The Merchant wishes them another fate?
A sudden turnabout, and curious.
What path ought they to take? All ears am I."
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
“漂泊的商人想改变他们命运中的既定？
如此突如其来的转折，令人大吃一惊。
他们会踏上哪条道路？我愿洗耳恭听。”
languages.original_text:
"The Merchant wishes them another fate?
A sudden turnabout, and curious.
What path ought they to take? All ears am I."

traits.locale_text:
“漂泊的商人想改变他们命运中的既定？
如此突如其来的转折，令人大吃一惊。
他们会踏上哪条道路？我愿洗耳恭听。”
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
«¿{mf|El|La} Mercader les desea otro destino?
Un giro curioso y repentino.
¿Qué camino deberían tomar? Soy todo oídos».
languages.original_text:
"The Merchant wishes them another fate?
A sudden turnabout, and curious.
What path ought they to take? All ears am I."

traits.locale_text:
«¿{mf|El|La} Mercader les desea otro destino?
Un giro curioso y repentino.
¿Qué camino deberían tomar? Soy todo oídos».
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
「商人は彼らに別の運命を授けるのか？
突然の転機は好奇心をかきたてる
彼らはどんな道を歩むのか、この耳にそっと聞かせてほしい」
languages.original_text:
"The Merchant wishes them another fate?
A sudden turnabout, and curious.
What path ought they to take? All ears am I."

traits.locale_text:
「商人は彼らに別の運命を授けるのか？
突然の転機は好奇心をかきたてる
彼らはどんな道を歩むのか、この耳にそっと聞かせてほしい」
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
"Ihr Schicksal wünscht der Händler anders nun?
Ein Sinneswandel jäh und sonderbar.
So sagt mir: Welcher Pfad soll es nun sein?"
languages.original_text:
"The Merchant wishes them another fate?
A sudden turnabout, and curious.
What path ought they to take? All ears am I."

traits.locale_text:
"Ihr Schicksal wünscht der Händler anders nun?
Ein Sinneswandel jäh und sonderbar.
So sagt mir: Welcher Pfad soll es nun sein?"
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
« {mf|Le Marchand|La Marchande} souhaite pour eux un autre destin ?
Quel étrange retournement, et si soudain.
Je vous écoute : quel devrait être leur chemin ? »
languages.original_text:
"The Merchant wishes them another fate?
A sudden turnabout, and curious.
What path ought they to take? All ears am I."

traits.locale_text:
{mf|Le Marchand|La Marchande} souhaite pour eux un autre destin ?
Quel étrange retournement, et si soudain.
Je vous écoute : quel devrait être leur chemin ? »
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
"Tüccar'ın aklından geçen nasıl bir kader?
Anlatsın, çekmesin onlar için keder,
Arleken dinler, Tüccar söylerse eğer."
languages.original_text:
"The Merchant wishes them another fate?
A sudden turnabout, and curious.
What path ought they to take? All ears am I."

traits.locale_text:
"Tüccar'ın aklından geçen nasıl bir kader?

traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle
